description:
While it should be a time of rejoicing for the victorious Soyokaze crew, there’s only one thing on their minds... where is Tylor? Meanwhile, Yuriko must avert a catastrophe that would surely plunge the UPSF back into war with the Raalgon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: My Way Is the Hard Way
マイウェイが切なくて
